sense.gloss: cooking for oneself, cooking one's own food, doing one's own cooking, making food oneself, self-catering
scanning a book or magazine to create an ebook by oneself
to boil, to simmer, to stew, to seethe
rice gruel containing vegetables, fish, etc., and seasoned with miso or soy sauce
food (esp. chicken and vegetables) boiled in plain water (or sometimes dashi, etc.) and served with dipping sauce (esp. ponzu)
having a cooking capacity of one liter
heating a vessel without water in it, heating an empty pan, kettle, boiler, bathtub, etc.
rice seasoned and cooked with various ingredients
to be boiled, to be cooked, to be done, to be ready
food (meat, fish, vegetables, etc.) cooked separately but served together on one dish
oden, dish of various ingredients, e.g. egg, daikon, potato, chikuwa, konnyaku, etc. stewed in soy-flavored dashi
food cooked in miso, cooking in miso
freshly boiled (rice), freshly cooked, steaming, piping hot
woman who served both as a waitress and a prostitute in Osaka teahouses
to cook (esp. grains such as rice, by boiling), to finish cooking
fleeting nature of riches and honour (honor)
to be cooked, to have finished cooking
woman who assists in food preparation
to distribute rice (e.g. during an emergency)
Bureau of the Imperial Palace Kitchens (under the ritsuryō system)
cooking (rice) quickly (e.g. by using a quick cook function on a rice cooker), quick cook

sdata.j: これがお↑米↑↓こめ↓の↑炊↑↓た↓き↑方↑↓かた↓です。
sdata.e: This is how we cook rice.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑自炊↑↓じすい↓に↑慣↑↓な↓れている。
sdata.e: I'm used to cooking for myself.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑炊事↑↓すいじ↓が↑全然↑↓ぜんぜん↓できない。
sdata.e: I'm all thumbs in the kitchen.

sdata.j: ↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓↑器↑↓き↓のスイッチを↑入↑↓い↓れてね。
sdata.e: Turn on the rice cooker, please.

sdata.j: とろ↑火↑↓び↓で↑時間↑↓じかん↓をかけて↑豆↑↓まめ↓を↑炊↑↓た↓いてください。
sdata.e: Please simmer the beans for a while over a low heat.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は、↑新居↑↓しんきょ↓へ↑移↑↓うつ↓ると↑共↑↓とも↓に、↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑部屋↑↓へや↓へ↑引↑↓ひ↓っ↑込↑↓こ↓んで、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓で↑炊事↑↓すいじ↓できるだけの↑道具↑↓どうぐ↓ーー↑土釜↑↓どがま↓、↑土鍋↑↓どなべ↓、↑七輪↑↓しちりん↓の↑類↑↓るい↓をととのえた。
sdata.e: When I moved into my new home, I just brought with me the things that I needed for cooking, an earthen rice cooker, an earthenware pot and an earthen charcoal brazier.

sdata.j: ガス↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓↑器↑↓き↓が↑壊↑↓こわ↓れたので、↑I↑↓あい↓↑H↑↓えいち↓↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓↑器↑↓き↓に↑変↑↓か↓えました。
sdata.e: I broke my gas-powered rice cooker so I got an induction rice cooker instead.

sdata.j: お↑米↑↓こめ↓↑2↑↓に↓↑合↑↓ごう↓↑炊↑↓た↓いといて。
sdata.e: Cook 2 Japanese cups of rice.

sdata.j: お↑米↑↓こめ↓↑2↑↓に↓↑合↑↓ごう↓↑炊↑↓た↓いといて。
sdata.e: Cook 300 grams of rice.

sdata.j: お↑米↑↓こめ↓↑2↑↓に↓↑合↑↓ごう↓↑炊↑↓た↓いといて。
sdata.e: Cook about 12 ounces of rice.

sdata.j: お↑米↑↓こめ↓↑2↑↓に↓↑合↑↓ごう↓↑炊↑↓た↓いといて。
sdata.e: Cook about one and a half cup of rice.

sdata.j: トムは↑日本↑↓にほん↓で↑買↑↓か↓ってきた↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓↑器↑↓き↓を↑愛用↑↓あいよう↓している。
sdata.e: Tom always uses the rice cooker that he brought back from Japan.

sdata.j: これがお↑米↑↓こめ↓の↑炊↑↓た↓き↑方↑↓かた↓です。
sdata.e: This is how to cook rice.

sdata.j: まだ↑玄米↑↓げんまい↓を↑炊↑↓た↓いてる↑途中↑↓とちゅう↓です。
sdata.e: The brown rice is still cooking.

sdata.j: ↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓↑器↑↓き↓でご↑飯↑↓はん↓を↑炊↑↓た↓くよ。
sdata.e: We cook rice in a rice cooker.

sdata.j: お↑米↑↓こめ↓のおいしい↑炊↑↓た↓き↑方↑↓かた↓↑知↑↓し↓ってる？
sdata.e: Do you know how to cook rice well?

sdata.j: お↑祝↑↓いわ↓いに↑赤飯↑↓せきはん↓でも↑炊↑↓た↓こうかしら。
sdata.e: As a celebration, I wonder if I should cook red rice or something?

sdata.j: お↑祝↑↓いわ↓いに↑赤飯↑↓せきはん↓でも↑炊↑↓た↓こうかしら。
sdata.e: To celebrate, I wonder if I should cook red rice or something?

sdata.j: お↑米↑↓こめ↓はこうやって↑炊↑↓た↓くんだ。
sdata.e: This is how we cook rice.

sdata.j: ご↑飯↑↓はん↓はこうやって↑炊↑↓た↓くんだよ。
sdata.e: This is how we cook rice.

sdata.j: ご↑飯↑↓はん↓はこうやって↑炊↑↓た↓くんだよ。
sdata.e: This is how you cook rice.

sdata.j: ↑家↑↓いえ↓に、↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓↑器↑↓き↓ってある？
sdata.e: Do you have a rice cooker at home?

sdata.j: トムは↑電気↑↓でんき↓↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓↑器↑↓き↓を↑持↑↓も↓ってます。
sdata.e: Tom has an electric rice cooker.

sdata.j: ↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓↑器↑↓き↓が↑買↑↓か↓いたいな。
sdata.e: I want to buy a rice cooker.

sdata.j: ↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓↑器↑↓き↓は↑持↑↓も↓ってません。
sdata.e: I don't have a rice cooker.

sdata.j: ↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓ジャーが↑買↑↓か↓いたいな。
sdata.e: I want to buy a rice cooker.

sdata.j: ↑俺↑↓おれ↓が↑買↑↓か↓った↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓の↑高性能↑↓こうせいのう↓↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓↑器↑↓き↓は、マジで↑高↑↓たか↓いだけのことはある。
sdata.e: The Japanese high tech rice cooker that I bought is really worth every penny.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑買↑↓か↓った↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓↑製↑↓せい↓の↑高性能↑↓こうせいのう↓↑炊飯↑↓すいはん↓ジャーなんだけど、↑買↑↓か↓うだけのことはあるわ。
sdata.e: The Japanese high tech rice cooker that I bought is really worth every penny.
